syn: ôter les mots de la bouche
arracher les mots de la bouche
types.html:
enlever les mots de la bouche

  1. to take the words out of (someone's) mouth (to say what someone was about to say themselves) [with à ‘someone’]
    Synonyms: ôter les mots de la bouche, arracher les mots de la bouche
    Tu m'as enlevé les mots de la bouche ! ― You took the words right out of my mouth!
trans: to take the words out of  mouth  .mw-parser-output .object-usage-tag{font-style:italic}.mw-parser-output .deprecated{color:olivedrab}

title: enlever les mots de la bouche
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɑ̃l.ve le mo d(ə) la buʃ/
